name: Cursify
description: A curated platform showcasing innovative animated web development resources.

name: UI-SNIPPETS
description: Offers ready-to-use UI snippets with smooth animations for modern websites.

name: Magic UI
description: Provides dynamic UI components with eye-catching animations for web projects.

name: Eldora UI
description: A creative UI resource delivering unique animated elements for web design.

name: Aceternity UI
description: Features a collection of animated UI components tailored for modern web apps.

name: Bossadizenith UI
description: Offers engaging animated UI elements to enhance user experiences on the web.

name: C UI
description: A minimalist UI resource that blends clean design with subtle animations.

name: Bits UI
description: A React-based collection of UI snippets enriched with fluid animations.

name: Vanta UI
description: Showcases dynamic animated backgrounds and interactive UI components for web projects.

name: UI Layouts
description: Provides pre-designed UI layouts featuring modern animations for engaging interfaces.

name: Motion Primitives
description: Essential building blocks to create smooth, high-quality web animations.

name: Dyna UI
description: A design resource offering dynamic and animated UI components for web applications.

name: Universe UI
description: A futuristic resource for UI components with captivating, cosmic animations.

name: Rombo
description: A unique UI library that blends Tailwind CSS with creative animated elements.

name: Varient Valtd
description: Offers a vault of variant UI components featuring innovative animations for modern sites.

name: GSAP (GreenSock)
description: A powerful JavaScript library for creating high-performance animations.

name: Framer Motion
description: A React library for declarative, interactive animations and gesture handling.

name: Anime.js
description: A lightweight and flexible JavaScript animation library with robust features.

name: React Spring
description: A spring-physics based animation library for creating smooth and natural React animations.

name: Lottie
description: Renders Adobe After Effects animations as lightweight JSON for use on the web.

name: Three.js
description: A JavaScript library for creating and displaying animated 3D graphics using WebGL.

name: Popmotion
description: A low-level JavaScript motion library for crafting smooth and performant animations.

name: Velocity.js
description: A fast and feature-rich animation engine that serves as a jQuery alternative.

name: Theatre.js
description: A timeline-based library for creating interactive and expressive motion designs.

name: AutoAnimate
description: A zero-configuration library that automatically animates layout changes for smooth transitions.
